name: Furry house
description:
The protagonist of a furry house is a boy forced by some events to move in with his mother. Making things difficult is that the mother and sisters are of another species, not human beings but furry!
The main character must therefore try to resist the oppression of the sisters and the other guests of the house. He will find himself involved in familiar intrigues and will have to try to take advantage of situations.
A furry house is a visual novel, the game is based on dialogue and images. The player will have to make the right choices to raise the relational values ​​and thus unlock other events and new scenes.
The player will be able to move in a house through the various rooms, and keep time and days going.
There will be quests to solve that will serve the player to understand the status of the game.
